休会明け: (きゅうかいあけ) - reassembling of a legislature
休出: (きゅうしゅつ) - working on a day off
休刊号: (きゅうかんごう) - last issue (of a magazine, etc. which has suspended publication); final issue
休前日: (きゅうぜんじつ) - day before a holiday
休園: (きゅうえん) - temporary closure (park, zoo, kindergarten, etc.)
休場: (きゅうじょう) - theater closure/theatre closure/stage absence; {sumo} wrestler's absence from the tournament
休学: (きゅうがく) - temporary absence from school; suspension
休心: (きゅうしん) - peace of mind; relief
休息所: (きゅうそくじょ) - lobby; lounge; recreation room; break room
休息時間: (きゅうそくじかん) - recess; break; breathing spell
休憩をとる: (きゅうけいをとる) - to take a break
休憩を取る: (きゅうけいをとる) - to take a break
休憩室: (きゅうけいしつ) - break room; lounge (e.g. in an onsen); resting room
休憩所: (きゅうけいじょ) - rest area; rest stop; service area; SA; parking area (e.g. off highways); PA
休憩時間: (きゅうけいじかん) - rest time; intermission
休戚: (きゅうせき) - weal and woe; welfare
休戦会談: (きゅうせんかいだん) - armistice conference
休戦協定: (きゅうせんきょうてい) - cease-fire agreement
休戦地帯: (きゅうせんちたい) - demilitarized zone; demilitarised zone; DMZ
休戦条約: (きゅうせんじょうやく) - armistice treaty
休戦記念日: (きゅうせんきねんび) - Armistice Day
休日出勤: (きゅうじつしゅっきん) - working on a day off
休日明け: (きゅうじつあけ) - the day after a holiday
休暇: (kyuuka) - holiday, day off, furlough, absence (do trabalho)
休暇願い: (きゅうかねがい) - application for leave
休校: (きゅうこう) - closing school (temporarily); dropping one's studies
休業: (きゅうぎょう) - closed (e.g. store); business suspended; shutdown; holiday
休止符を打つ: (きゅうしふをうつ) - to put a period to
休漁: (きゅうりょう) - suspension of fishing
休猟: (きゅうりょう) - suspension of hunting
休眠芽: (きゅうみんが) - dormant bud; latent bud
休神: (きゅうしん) - peace of mind; relief
休筆: (きゅうひつ) - taking a break from writing
休職: (きゅうしょく) - temporary retirement; suspension from office
休肝日: (きゅうかんび) - (joc) (pun on 休館日) teetotal day; day off drinking; liver rest day
休茶屋: (やすみじゃや) - wayside teahouse; tea house used as a resting place
休薬: (きゅうやく) - drug withdrawal; cessation of medication
休診: (きゅうしん) - being closed (e.g. clinic); not seeing patients; not accepting patients
休診日: (きゅうしんび) - doctor's no-consultation day
休講: (きゅうこう) - lecture cancellation; cancelling (lecture, class, etc.)
休載: (きゅうさい) - nonappearance in print; stopping publication (of serialized content in newspapers, magazines, etc.)
休部: (きゅうぶ) - club that has suspended its activities; not attending one's club
休養室: (きゅうようしつ) - rest or recreation room
休館: (きゅうかん) - closure (of a library, museum, etc.)
休館日: (きゅうかんび) - day on which a museum, etc. is regularly closed; closed day
会: (e) - association , meeting, assembly, party; association, club
会う: (あう) - (逢う is often used for close friends, etc. and may be associated with drama or pathos; 遭う may have an undesirable nuance) to meet/to encounter/to see; (esp. 遭う when in kanji) to have an accident/to have a bad experience
会す: (あわす) - to make (someone) to meet/to let (someone) meet; to expose to/to subject to
会する: (かいする) - to meet/to assemble/to gather; to encounter/to run into
会わす: (あわす) - to make (someone) to meet/to let (someone) meet; to expose to/to subject to
会わせる: (あわせる) - to make (someone) to meet/to let (someone) meet; to expose to/to subject to
会を催す: (かいをもよおす) - to hold a meeting
会を抜ける: (かいをぬける) - to withdraw from a society; to quit an association; to give up one's membership of a society
会主: (かいしゅ) - sponsor of a meeting
会党: (かいとう) - any of a number of secret societies of ancient China (often opposed to the government)
会則: (かいそく) - society or club regulations; constitution
会合に臨む: (かいごうにのぞむ) - to be present at a meeting
会合周期: (かいごうしゅうき) - synodic period
